title: Stuckit Stickers
description: Stuckit Stickers is a product which allows skateboarders to share their tricks with the world. All you have to do is buy a sticker, scan the QR code, upload your skate trick to the sticker, and put the sticker where you please. Bonus points if you put the sticker where you did the trick! Learn more at Stuckit.co.

title: Grocery Store Visualization
description: Received Best Project Award (top 3% in class of 180 Students). This visualization shows the nutrient breakdown of an optimized grocery list with a 208 dollar budget. Click on the image to see more...

title: Deceptive Visualizations
description: Data can tell many different stories. In this project, abortion data from the same source was used to portray two different stories. Click on the image to see more...

title: Cancer Incidence and Environmental Factors
description: Used vizualizations to explore the relationship between cancer incidence and environmental factors in the United States. The project includes interactive maps and charts to illustrate findings.

title: Sports Betting Spread Analysis
description: This Project analyzes the spread of sports betting data to identify patterns and trends. It uses Python and various libraries for data analysis and visualization. The goal of the project was to see if there was a hothand falacy at play.
